markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Points of interest

* Two small homes in the port district of Neketaka, one north of [Rebero](/rebero/)'s Fine Fashion (containing [Xopn'aua](/xopnaua/)), the other on the east side of [The Wild Mare](/theWildMare/). Neither of these locations are present on the overview map.

## Trivia

* The light coming from the window above the bed changes depending on the time of day.

## Pets

* [Xopn'aua](/xopnaua/) - "Forsaken Dog": Northern home, by the fireplace.

title: Queen's Berth district home
